font.marquee: *Middle School or High School Yearbooks can still be ordered at Yearbookforever.com*

div.p:
Sequoyah families and community,
Sequoyah Public School’s Continuous Learning Plan , which is focused on keeping our students moving toward a life-long love of learning, has been approved by the Oklahoma State Department of Education.
Our goal is to provide a positive academic experience for students and guardians without being overwhelming. This plan will begin April 6, 2020, and continue . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Continuous Learning Plan Information

div.p:
Sequoyah Upper Elementary students in grades 3rd - 5th recently participated in the academic "Battle of the Brains" competition where every grade successfully placed in every category.
3rd grade:
Jonothan Annett, 3rd place - Science; Gibson Benner, 1st place - Math; Rylee Howell, 4th place - Language Arts; Kristen Holt, 3rd place - Social Studies; Camden Matthews, 2nd place - Social Studies. . . .
